p: According to the standard calibration curve of Catechin, as shown in Figure 1, the equation y = 0.0009 x + 0.0078, R 2 = 0.982 was used to estimate the total procyanidin content in the PJ plant methanolic fractions, where y is the absorbance at 500 nm and x is the total tannin content in the plant fraction. The results showed that the total procyanidin content in PJ methanolic fraction was 18.55 ± 0.55 mg of CAE/g.
